citations.narrative:
On March 20th, 2025, a 3 year old female shih tzu/chihuahua mix went missing. This was an outdoor dog that was
housed in a barn, but had access to leave the barn whenever it wished. The licensee was unable to immediately find the
dog. On April 11th, 2025 the dog was found deceased in a horse pasture. The cause of death is unconfirmed. Not
housing the dog in a facility in which it contains the dog securely doesn't ensure the safety of the dog. All dogs must be
kept in a housing facility that protects and contains the dog securely. Correct starting on 6/16/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
n

narrative:
3.1(a)  Critical
   
Housing facilities, general. 
On March 20th, 2025, a 3 year old female shih tzu/chihuahua mix went missing. This was an outdoor dog that was 
housed in a barn, but had access to leave the barn whenever it wished. The licensee was unable to immediately find the 
dog. On April 11th, 2025 the dog was found deceased in a horse pasture. The cause of death is unconfirmed. Not 
housing the dog in a facility in which it contains the dog securely doesn't ensure the safety of the dog. All dogs must be 
kept in a housing facility that protects and contains the dog securely. Correct starting on 6/16/25. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End of report. 
 
 n
